title: Somebody tried to change my email.

replies.body:
As well as changing your password, run a full malware scan on your pc. If you have a keylogger, it'll just catch your new password too. 
I'd also clear the history on your browser, incase a bad cookie or temp file is behind it.

Yea, change your password. I can see that your email is verified so only you should be able to do that.

If you change your password they should no longer be able to lodge support tickets on your account.
